alert.note: Alert for West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 1:58AM MST until December 29 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Areas of blowing snow and low visibility are possible. * WHERE...West Central Mountains and West Central Plateau. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-40. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau
